text: @piersmorgan @ChrisGiles_ I'm beginning to get pissed off with the government saying ...teachers and pupils can start going back to school and if they show symptoms of coronavirus they will be tested ffs if there is a chance of them going back to school and show symptoms why the hell are they going back .
